nodes.text: Understanding Robotics is a department within the Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 magazine published by De Agostini, which covers details about the real-life robotics.

This section explains the technology behind the parts that you are assembling. These illustrated articles help you to understand the function of electronic and mechanical parts, including things like sensors, motors, wi-fi, logic boards, and much more.
